name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Automa - Web page automation tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that helps to automate actions in a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It allows the users to automate the actions in a web page like filling forms, click a button, focus on an element etc... It can help to automate the repeated tasks in your work.
